response.value:
There are two of the most popular of transportation used by students which are riding a bike and taking a bus. However, these transportation method have advantages and disadvantages. This report will discuss both views.

The student's most popular transportation method is biking. There are a lot of advantages of biking. It is the most cheapest compare to others transportation methods. Also, it is good to environment since it is not cause any pollution. in addition, the most importance, it provide both benefits at the same time which are giving a chance to cardio to students and get students to the destination. On the other hand, there are also many downsides of biking. the first issue is safety. There are limited bike lane and sometimes cars are driving on bike lane which might led to accidents. Secondly, biking is get students to the destination slower than other transportation. The last mentioned downside of biking is students have to change cloth after long duration of biking.

The second most popular means of transportation is train. Taking a train to the destination is also good for environment. it is far more quicker compare to biking especially long distance traveling. There are many train stations in London. It take less than five minutes from any universities to a train stations in London. However, there are many advantages on using a train. The ticket is expensive, this is a major issue of students who live far from London. In addition, Trains sometime delay or cancel in both rush hour and off-peak period. it is also usually crowned in rush hour.

These following recomendation might imporve or solve the downsides of
